title: Bugsplats when joining
body:
So I just got a Pc from a family member who use to play league with me so i was in the train of thought that league should run but it keeps bugsplatting after champ select and now i have a leaverbuster T_T, im not complaining about the leaverbuster cause its only a 5 game one but i wish to be able to play the game i love. So when the game goes the load screen it will go black then bugsplat. 

here are my specs:
6gb Ram
amd 2.7ghz processor
and it runs windows 10
gpu: GeForce GT 630
all my drivers are up to date

Pls help me in any way possible i have tried everything i could think of including a fresh install of league.

replies.body:
There were some recent changes pushed out via Windows 10 updates that are causing these types of issues. I strongly recommend completing the steps below as a quick check to see if these changes are affecting you.

First, I recommend going into your Windows Display settings and ensuring your display resolution is set to what's recommended by Windows. You can find a link on how to do that [here.](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/4910-screen-resolution-display-change-windows-10-a.html)

Second, I suggest completing a reset of your config folder, since these settings will be out of sync with your new resolution. Log into League, then delete the *Config* folder in the following directory:

> C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Restart your client and hop into a custom match to ensure the changes went through. Let me know if those steps worked.
